functions.name: recommend_destinations
functions.description: Suggest LH-Group destinations for a given theme and month, optionally returning top flight options.

originCode.description: Origin IATA code (defaults to session's inferred origin if omitted).

month.description: Target month or phrase (e.g., 'March next year' or '2026-03').

monthRange.description: Explicit range 'YYYY-MM..YYYY-MM'. If present, takes precedence over 'month'.

themeTags.description: JSON array or comma-separated list of themes, e.g. ['beach','warm'] or 'beach,warm'.

minAvgHighC.description: Minimum average high temperature (C) in the target month.

maxCandidates.description: Maximum number of destination candidates to return (default 8).

withItineraries.description: If true and origin is known, also search best itineraries for top candidates.

currency.description: Preferred currency code for pricing (default ENV or EUR).
